# Total removal cost

## Data requirements/sources
The [Dam Removal Cost Estimator Tool](https://wrises.shinyapps.io/DamRemovalCostPredictiveModel/) provides estimates of the total cost of dam removals in the US based on a regression model fit with characteristics and costs of past removals. This model takes as its input:

* Dam height
* Dam material
* Project complexity
* Annual average discharge
* Drainage area
* Region
